item.title: Echo TV
item.description: Echo TV was a christian-conservative Hungarian television channel owned and operated by Echo Hung√°ria TV Zrt , and founded in 2005 to cover business news. Later focusing on news broadcasting and public affairs, it was known as a supporter of Fidesz and KDNP. Source
